item.title: The Biggest Video Game Releases of March 2025
item.content:encoded:
https://insider-gaming.com/the-biggest-video-game-releases-of-march-2025/

With the absolute smash month that is February 2025, in which we see the release of Kingdom Come: Deliverance 2, Civilization VII, Assassin’s Creed: Shadows, and Avowed, March may appear like a lightweight initially. The month does feature a few big releases, like Two Point Museum and Atomfall, but they’re more niche. No matter, the biggest video game releases in March 2025 still look enticing!

The Hottest Game Releases of March 2025

If you’re looking for a slew of AAA releases in the month of March, then you’re going to be sorely disappointed. But if you want a few indie and AA titles to round out your library and provide a little break from the big studio releases before summer, then March definitely has you covered!

  • Two Point Museum (PC/PlayStation 5/Xbox Series X|S) – March 4, 2025
  • Split Fiction (PC/PlayStation 5/Xbox Series X|S) – March 6, 2025
  • FragPunk (PC/PlayStation 5/Xbox Series X|S) – March 6, 2025
  • Lost Records: Bloom & Rage Tape 2 (PC/PlayStation 5/Xbox Series X|S) – March 18, 2025
  • Xenoblade Chronicles X: Definitive Edition (Nintendo Switch) – March 20, 2025
  • Atelier Yumia: The Alchemist of Memories & the Envisioned Land (PC/PlayStation 4/PlayStation 5/Xbox One/Xbox Series X|S/Nintendo Switch) – March 21, 2025
  • Bleach: Rebirth of Souls (PC/PlayStation 4/PlayStation 5/Xbox Series X|S) – March 21, 2025
  • Tales of the Shire (PC/PlayStation 5/Xbox Series X|S/Nintendo Switch) – March 25, 2025
  • Atomfall (PC/PlayStation 4/PlayStation 5/Xbox One/Xbox Series X|S) – March 27, 2025

Furthermore, a handful of titles are expected in March 2025 but with no official release date, including Commandos: Origins, Football Manager 25, and Killing Floor 3.

Looking Forward to April 2025

Before anyone gets too excited, April looks like a light month—at least for now. The most significant releases aren’t that major and include:

  • The Last of Us Part II Remastered (PC)
  • Fatal Fury: City of the Wolves
  • Tempest Rising

This is the lull before summer pops off; just wait and see!

Did you dive into any of the big releases in February? Let us know which was your favorite in the comments, or visit the community forum to start a discussion!
